title: Journal of Complementary and Integrative Medicine Volume 18 Issue 1

cleaned_text: Your purchase has been completed. Your documents are now available to view. ObjectiveJournal of Complementary and Integrative Medicine (JCIM) focuses on evidence concerning the efficacy and safety of complementary medical (CM) whole systems, practices, interventions and natural health products, including herbal and traditional medicines. The journal is edited by Ed Lui of the University of Western Ontario. Article formatsResearch Articles, Review Articles, Mini Reviews, Discussion/Opinion Papers, Short Communications, Editorials
